data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Lower River who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lower River, Gambia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Lower River, Gambia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Lower River to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Lower River, Gambia today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Kaiaf
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Kaiaf, Lower River, Gambia.
Spirit, guide the 667 believers in the state of Lower River into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Lower River, Gambia to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.section_summary:
the state of Lower River, Gambia has a population of 73,500.

We estimate Lower River has 667 people who might know Jesus, 2,002 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 70,830 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 110 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Lower River, Gambia and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

location.name: Lower River
location.cities_list: Soma, Baro Kunda, Mansa Konko, Sankwia, Kaiaf
